abstract: Robert J. McCann, the former head of wealth management at Merrill Lynch who recently settled his lawsuit with Bank of America over the terms of his contract, was named Tuesday by UBS to head its North American wealth management business.
snippet: Robert J. McCann, the former head of wealth management at Merrill Lynch who recently settled his lawsuit with Bank of America over the terms of his contract, was named Tuesday by UBS to head its North American wealth management business.
lead_paragraph: Maybe now they can both just get back to business and forget about 2009.

headline.main: UBS Names McCann to Head U.S. Wealth Unit

abstract: Miller Buckfire, the boutique investment bank known for its restructuring expertise, said on Tuesday that it has hired Jason R. Anderson from Bank of America as a managing director focused on industrial and automotive companies.
snippet: Miller Buckfire, the boutique investment bank known for its restructuring expertise, said on Tuesday that it has hired Jason R. Anderson from Bank of America as a managing director focused on industrial and automotive companies.
lead_paragraph: Miller Buckfire, the boutique investment bank known for its restructuring expertise, said on Tuesday that it has hired Jason R. Anderson from Bank of America as a managing director focused on industrial and automotive companies.
